body: I can't log in for some reason because it says account transfers are unable to happen in the updated client and i should switch to the legacy client but i cant even click that either cuz as soon as i open it it opens a small window saying i should restart the client or shut it down

replies.body: Around the time you posted this, there was an external network issue going on that was affecting a few of our services and preventing logins. This has since been resolved, so if you're still running into issues, let me know.
